name: Best Fish Tacos
author: Mandycu2172
summary: Fast and easy, delicious fish tacos -- simply the best! When I have extra time, I like to add just a little cilantro, red onion, tomato, and avocado on top of mine with the lettuce, tomato, and crema!
ingredients: 2 tablespoons Mexican crema, or to taste
½  canned chipotle pepper in adobo sauce
directions: Place lime zest, cilantro, garlic, cumin, 1 1/2 teaspoons salt, and pepper in a small food processor bowl
Place tilapia fillets in a 1-gallon resealable plastic bag
Add the garlic mixture and move fish around to coat each fillet
Let sit at room temperature, 15 to 20 minutes
Blend crema and chipotle pepper together in a food processor until smooth
Heat an electric nonstick griddle to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Cook fillets until just opaque and easily flaked with a fork, 3 to 4 minutes per side
Cut fish into strips and place in tortillas with lettuce and tomatoes
Top with the chipotle crema and serve with lime wedges on the side
